issue.title: [C++] GCS tests are quite noisy
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15046](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15046). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The GCS filesystem tests produce a lot of output even successful. It would be nice to make them more quiet.
https://gist.github.com/pitrou/4efe5338bbab9b13c2ae7a6b3219a1d7
